sourcing.instructions: Cobalt(II) oxide can be purchased from chemical supply stores or online chemical suppliers.
steps: Cobalt(II) oxide can be purchased from chemical supply stores or online chemical suppliers.
1. Measure 100 g of cobalt(II) oxide and place in a clean mixing container.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure 100 g of cobalt(II) oxide and place in a clean mixing container.

steps: 1. Preheat the oven to 800 째C (1472 째F).
heating.raw_text: 1. Preheat the oven to 800 째C (1472 째F).

steps: 1. After heating, turn off the oven and allow it to cool down to room temperature naturally.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After heating, turn off the oven and allow it to cool down to room temperature naturally.

steps: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid sample from the mold.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid sample from the mold.
